name: Powerful Peasant
description:
Part of the 2022 GameDev.tv game jam themed "Death is only the beginning". You play the role of a knight who has just passed into the afterlife and must confront his mind at every stage in his life. From when he became the mighty king of his nation to when he was a wee peasant. Your primary focus is to utilize your platforming skills to manoeuvre your way past monsters and reach the scarecrow located at different points in every level to progress. Will you make it through your mind?

Credits: Ant (1Antz1) and Laura (Peachypocky)
